item.title: 农民抗议大米价格过低，泰国将援助大米市场
item.description: 在农民因大米价格下跌而加紧在曼谷举行抗议活动之后，泰国政府正在考虑采取措施支持国内大米市场。【原文：Thailand’s government is considering measures to support the domestic rice market after farmers stepped up protests in Bangkok in the face of falling prices.】

item.title: 印度消费类股遭遇史上最严重亏损，减税反弹势头消退
item.description: 随着投资者的关注焦点重新回到疲软的需求上，减税推动的印度主要消费品股的涨势已经失去了动力。【原文：A tax-cut fueled rally in India’s consumer staples shares has lost steam as investor focus reverts back to weak demand.】

item.title: 魁北克养老金经理斥责卡车公司 TFI 计划迁往美国
item.description: 加拿大卡车运输和物流公司 TFI International Inc. 表示将把总部迁往美国，这招致了其最大股东之一的批评。【原文：Canadian trucking and logistics company TFI International Inc. said it will move its headquarters to the US, earning criticism from one of its largest shareholders.】

item.title: 日本央行越来越难忽视食品通胀问题
item.description: 随着大米和卷心菜等主食价格的飙升，日本的食品通胀成为管理每月预算的家庭的热门话题，也日益成为中央银行的热门话题。【原文：Food inflation in Japan is a hot topic for households managing monthly budgets — and increasingly for the central bank as well, as prices for staples including rice and cabbage soar.】

item.title: 花旗印度计划购买 10 亿美元资产支持证券
item.description: 花旗集团印度分部将购买创纪录的资产抵押证券，因为国内贷款机构在存款增长疲软的情况下寻求流动性。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s India unit is set to buy record asset-backed securities as domestic lenders seek liquidity amid sluggish deposit growth.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利放弃看空 MSCI 中国指数，认为有 4% 的上涨空间
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的策略师们放弃了看跌中国股市的观点，转而对中国股市持更加乐观的态度，他们跟随华尔街的同行们预测，在中国技术突破的刺激下，中国股市将出现更加可持续的反弹。【原文：Morgan Stanley strategists shed their bearish view on Chinese stocks to turn more optimistic, following Wall Street peers in predicting a more sustainable rally spurred by the country’s technological breakthrough.】

item.title: 澳大利亚出资 15 亿美元援助古普塔钢铁厂
item.description: 大亨桑吉夫-古普塔（Sanjeev Gupta）拥有的一家澳大利亚钢铁厂将获得政府 24 亿澳元（15 亿美元）的一揽子救助计划，一天前，该厂因未偿还债务被迫进入破产管理。【原文：An Australian steelworks owned by tycoon Sanjeev Gupta will receive a A$2.4 billion ($1.5 billion) government bailout package, a day after it was forced into administration due to unpaid debts.】

item.title: 嘉能可考虑减产，中国煤炭价格将进一步下跌
item.description: 矿业巨头嘉能可公司（Glencore Plc）在煤炭价格跌至近十年来最低点后被迫考虑减产，中国煤炭市场的低迷可能会持续数月，对全球市场造成压力。【原文：China’s coal slump is likely to persist for several months, weighing on a global market that has seen mining giant Glencore Plc forced to consider output cuts after prices dropped to near their lowest this decade.】

item.title: 斯威夫特称美元在全球交易中的使用率超过 50
item.description: 1 月份，美元在全球贸易中的优势不断攀升，在通过金融信息服务 Swift 发送的所有国际外汇交易中，美元的交易量略高于一半。【原文：The dollar’s prowess in global trade climbed in January, accounting for just over half of all the international foreign-exchange traffic sent via the financial messaging service Swift.】

item.title: 澳大利亚银行股因利润率担忧损失 260 亿澳元
item.description: 在两家最大的贷款机构报告利润率压力增大后，本周澳大利亚银行股下跌了 260 亿澳元，这加剧了人们对该行业盈利能力的担忧。【原文：A $26 billion rout in Australia bank stocks this week after two of the biggest lenders reported increasing margin pressure is fueling concern about the sector’s profitability.】

item.title: 失业率攀升，澳大利亚招聘仍持续增长
item.description: 澳大利亚 1 月份的失业率进一步上升，尽管招聘人数超出预期，这凸显出就业人数未能跟上求职人数的增长速度。【原文：Australia’s unemployment rate rose further in January even as hiring exceeded expectations, highlighting that employment has failed to keep pace with the number of people looking for work.】

item.title: 慧科停牌，前首席执行官怀特的未来成焦点
item.description: 慧科全球有限公司（WiseTech Global Ltd. ）的股票在悉尼停牌，董事会尚未公布最新的治理情况，这加剧了人们对该公司备受指责的创始人理查德-怀特（Richard White）未来的关注。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. shares were halted in Sydney before a governance update from the board, intensifying focus on the future of the company’s under-fire founder, Richard White.】

item.title: 英国消费者信心降至工党执政以来最低点
item.description: 在工党政府执政期间，英国家庭的信心降至新低，因为消费者担心物价上涨，而企业则警告说，工资税的增加将对招聘造成冲击。【原文：Confidence among UK households slipped to a new low under the Labour government, as consumers brace for higher prices and businesses warn of a hiring hit from rising payroll taxes.】

item.title: 慈善机构警告：英国电网公司赚取通胀带来的意外之财
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，由于监管漏洞，电网公司在过去四年中获得了超额利润，其借款计划与高通胀水平挂钩。【原文：Grid companies earned outsize profits over the last four years because of regulatory gaps, with their borrowing plans linked to high inflation levels, according to a new report.】

item.title: 亚洲货币对同类货币面临更多痛苦，因为低利率的影响
item.description: 据基金经理和策略师称，由于降息前景进一步削弱了亚洲新兴货币的吸引力，亚洲新兴货币相对于全球同类货币的表现将继续低迷。【原文：Emerging Asian currencies look set to extend their underperformance versus global peers as the prospect of interest-rate cuts further erodes their appeal, according to fund managers and strategists.】

item.title: 关注美国库存和供应不确定性，石油保持涨势
item.description: 由于一份行业报告显示美国原油库存再次增加，以及全球供应的不确定性挥之不去，石油在上涨后趋于平稳。【原文：Oil steadied after gains as an industry report flagged another build in US crude stockpiles, and uncertainty over global supplies lingered.】

item.title: 为迎合人工智能热潮融资 25 亿美元后，古德曼股价下跌
item.description: 嘉民集团的股票在悉尼下跌，此前这家房地产和基础设施公司通过折价配股筹集了 40 亿澳元（25 亿美元）资金，用于开发全球数据中心网络。【原文：Goodman Group stock fell in Sydney after the property and infrastructure firm raised A$4 billion ($2.5 billion) in a discounted share placement to develop a global network of data centers.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的 Slimmon 说："零售交易员的狂热是一种警告
item.description: 摩根士丹利投资管理公司（Morgan Stanley Investment Management）的安德鲁-斯利蒙（Andrew Slimmon）认为，散户投资者的现金大量涌入股市投机性最强的角落，这应该成为美国股市多头的一个警告。【原文：A flood of retail investor cash into the most speculative corners of the stock market should be a warning for US equity bulls, according to Morgan Stanley Investment Management’s Andrew Slimmon.】

item.title: 日本激进主义盛行颠覆股票多空策略
item.description: 收购要约和激进分子的干预正在支撑一些被认为基本面薄弱的日本公司的股票，使投资者的卖空策略更难成功。【原文：Takeover bids and activist intervention are shoring up shares of some Japanese companies seen as having weak fundamentals, making it harder for investors to succeed in short-selling strategies.】

item.title: 嘉吉合资公司将供应数十亿美元的船舶燃料
item.description: 大宗商品贸易巨头嘉吉公司（Cargill Inc.【原文：Commodity trading behemoth Cargill Inc. and tanker owner Hafnia Ltd. are forming a major new ship-fuel supplier, at a time when the maritime industry is bracing for emissions-cutting rules.】

item.title: 印度计划加强机票价格监管，因为昆布节费用激起民愤
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在印度教宗教集会期间机票价格大幅飙升受到广泛批评后，印度正计划加强对机票价格的监管。【原文：India is planning to step up oversight of airfares after a sharp spike in prices during a Hindu religious gathering was widely criticized, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲骑行市场放缓，Grab 销售额预测低于预期
item.description: Grab Holdings Ltd. 预计全年营收低于预期，表明该公司对东南亚打车和食品配送市场持谨慎态度，GoTo Group 仍是该市场的强劲对手。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd. predicted full-year revenue that trailed estimates, suggesting caution around a Southeast Asian ride-hailing and food delivery market where GoTo Group remains a formidable rival.】

item.title: 五角大楼报告削减预算后，Palantir 跌幅超过 10
item.description: 据报道，美国国防部长皮特-赫斯基（Pete Hesgeth）计划削减军费开支，Palantir Technologies Inc.股价周三下跌10%，并在盘后交易中继续下滑。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. shares fell 10% on Wednesday, and continued to slide in after-hours trading, following a report that US Defense Secretary Pete Hesgeth plans to slash military spending.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要显示谨慎态度，亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 美联储会议纪要显示，美联储并不急于降息，继华尔街走势平淡之后，周四亚洲股市注定下跌。【原文：Shares in Asia were set for declines Thursday following muted moves on Wall Street after Federal Reserve meeting minutes signaled that it’s in no rush to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 杰斐逊称美联储可在劳动力市场稳固的情况下慢慢来
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Philip Jefferson）表示，强劲的经济允许决策者在考虑进一步降息之前慢慢来。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair Philip Jefferson said a strong economy allows policymakers to take their time before considering any additional cuts to interest rates.】

item.title: 中国铁矿石需求下降，Fortescue 利润骤降 53
item.description: 由于中国对炼钢材料的需求减弱，铁矿石价格下跌，导致 Fortescue Ltd. 上半年利润同比骤降 53%。【原文：Fortescue Ltd.’s first-half profit plunged by 53% from the year before, hit by a decline in iron ore prices as Chinese demand for the steelmaking material waned.】

item.title: 对关税持谨慎态度的债券交易商回撤，美国利率波动性下跌
item.description: 在全球贸易战不断扩大的不确定性下，国债交易员们纷纷转而观望，导致衡量波动性的一个指标降至三年来的最低水平，并使收益率在区间内波动。【原文：Treasury traders are heading to the sidelines amid uncertainty over an expanding global trade war, sending one measure of volatility to its lowest level in three years and leaving yields rangebound.】

item.title: 贝森特将缺席在南非举行的二十国集团财长会议
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特不会前往参加下周在南非举行的 20 国集团财长会议，因为他将在上任后的头几周内专注于国内议程。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent won’t travel to the Group of 20 finance ministers meeting in South Africa next week as he focuses on the domestic agenda in his first weeks in office, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 律师下台后，特许经营集团推进重组工作
item.description: 特许经营集团公司（Franchise Group Inc. 尽管遭到次级贷款人的反对，而且指导这家陷入困境的品牌管理公司度过破产难关的律师事务所最近也被解聘，但该公司仍获得法院许可，继续推进可能的重组。【原文：Franchise Group Inc. won court permission to press ahead with a potential restructuring despite pushback from junior lenders and the recent removal of the law firm that had guided the troubled brand manager through bankruptcy.】

item.title: GTCR 为第二支战略增长基金筹资 36 亿美元
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社查阅的一份声明，私募股权公司 GTCR 为第二支战略增长基金募集了 36 亿美元，超过了 27.5 亿美元的目标，增强了其对小型收购的火力。【原文：Private equity firm GTCR raised $3.6 billion for a second strategic growth fund, surpassing its $2.75 billion target and boosting its firepower for smaller buyouts, according to a statement reviewed by Bloomberg News.】
